title: How to Draw a Cartoon Killer Bee

steps.headline: Start by drawing an egg shape in pencil, this will be the body.
steps.description: Make sure it is slanted to the left.

steps.headline: Leave a little space,then draw a cone shaped sting underneath the end of the egg.
Make sure the whole thing is slanted to the left.You will see why it is like this at the end.
Draw a Pac-man shape on its back, above the egg.
Draw a teardrop shape wing coming out of the Pac-man shape.
Now, draw the head (an alien shape) for the eyes,you can experiment.
You can draw a mean smile,like he (or she!)
Draw another wing, colour in the eyes, body or wing with a marker pen.
steps.description: Go over the pencil sketches with marker and you're done!

text: Start by drawing an egg shape in pencil, this will be the body. Make sure it is slanted to the left. Leave a little space,then draw a cone shaped sting underneath the end of the egg.  Make sure the whole thing is slanted to the left.You will see why it is like this at the end.  Draw a Pac-man shape on its back, above the egg.  Draw a teardrop shape wing coming out of the Pac-man shape.  Now, draw the head (an alien shape) for the eyes,you can experiment.  You can draw a mean smile,like he (or she!) is going to bite you! Draw another wing, colour in the eyes, body or wing with a marker pen. Go over the pencil sketches with marker and you're done! Finished.
